MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA4 postcode area of Renfrew. Following a recent power cut, It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 2:15pm in order to return the network to normal following recent repairs between East Yonderton and Walkinshaw Road and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:50pm on Friday, 26 February 2021
